bug.author: dsmilkov
bug.description:
I'm creating a mega issue to track all the issues related to WebGL+Windows.
#1384 #1381 #1337 #510 justadudewhohacks/face-api.js#43 #345 #381 #225

comments.comment:
Updates: With the help of the Intel team, and external contributors, I've made lot of progress. Latest tfjs-core unit tests show:
[PASS] 2017, Coffeelake, Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
[PASS] 2016, Kabylake, Intel(R) HD Graphics 630
[PASS] 2015, Skylake, Intel(R) HD Graphics 530
[1 FAIL] 2014, Broadwell, Intel(R) Iris(TM) Pro Graphics 6200
[2 FAIL] 2013, Haswell, Intel(R) HD Graphics 4600
[54 FAIL] 2013, Silvermont, low power, Celeron N2840

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dsmilkov>@dsmilkov</denchmark-link> , I am also facing issue related to Intel HD Graphics card,I have tried Face-api SSDMobilenetV1 Face detection and It is failing to detect the proper face. More Details on : <denchmark-link:https://github.com/justadudewhohacks/face-api.js/issues/495>justadudewhohacks/face-api.js#495</denchmark-link>
Intel GPU: Intel HD Graphics 4600 + win 7 ultimate It works fine on tfjs CPU backend but fails to provide same result on webgl backend. Could you please help? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dsmilkov>@dsmilkov</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nsthorat>@nsthorat</denchmark-link>
Closing this due to lack of activity, feel to reopen. Thank you
